title: Authenticating and In Game issue
body: I was 45mins into a close ranked game when my client needs to reconnect.  I check my internet connection in several ways (different browsers as well as computer status) and all say it should be working perfectly.  Assuming it was a client bug I closed and attempted to relaunch client only to have it inform me I can't be authenticated and that I should post the issue on this page.  Please solve, this issue almost certainly cost me the game and several bans.

replies.body: Yeah it looks like there were quite a few issues last night, sorry guys.  :(  Is everything okay now?
I confirmed the issue was Comcast for me after switching to Verizon network and it works now.
I also am unable to connect to authentication server. I was in the middle of an adc game where i was 8-2. I dont have comcast. All other internet works. Watching a youtube vid as I type this.
It looks like it's a Comcast issue. Do you use Comcast?
